message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be fair to propose a price of $1,200,000 for this exceptional item.
Alice, thanks for the offer. While I recognize the value of your product, I had a different budget in mind. I'd be willing to purchase for $900,000.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position, and I appreciate your interest in our product. In light of that, I am willing to consider a price of $1,050,000 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be frank, $950,000 is the highest I'm willing to go. If that works for you, I'm ready to close the deal.
